remarks: Value of the group of Dirichlet characters.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrval.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrval.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrval.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrval.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dchrval.d $e |- ( ph -> D = { x e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) | ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ x } ) $.
dchrval $p |- ( ph -> G = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , D >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , ( oF x. |` ( D X. D ) ) >. } ) $.
$d B x $.
$d N x $.
$d U x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
